title: @ElectroGrid
description: Creates a mesh representation of an electrode grid for use with SUMA

strip.title: Strip Nx
strip.description: Make an Nx strip (array) of electrodes.

grid.title: Grid Nx Ny
grid.description: Make an Nx by Ny grid of electrodes. A node at (i,j) has a node ID = i+Nx*j with 0<=i<Nx and 0<=j<=Ny

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Use PREFIX for the output surface.

coords.title: Coordinates
coords.description: Specify the coordinates of the nodes on the grid, or the array. XYZ.1D should have three columns, with each row specifying the coordinates of one node.

with_markers.title: With markers
with_markers.description: Add markers to the surface at each electrode.
